Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay”

Reviews.Content: stay location training staff location party feel welcome exceptionally clean provided amenities staff able direct excellent restaurant definitely staying

Reviews.Title: “fantastic location”
Reviews.Author: Hoosier1974
Reviews.Content: getting ready book jameson probably 8th time yearly meeting indy visiting times youd midprice hotel clean updated bedding comfortable breakfast wonderful lovely location nestled little wooded busy highway noise close northside

Reviews.Title: “The nicest people and place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: mameod
Reviews.Content: clean roomy adults service fantastic pick airport sunday night brought hotel little drove restaurant eat dinner picked provided continental breakfast hit spot start day drove medical building course doctors office pick airport drivers nice friendly staff front desk nice helpful highly recommend hotel look forward staying indianapolis thank staff jameson inn carmel appreciate kindness welcoming

Reviews.Title: “good location, great price”
Reviews.Author: kate8989
Reviews.Content: jameson inn welcome experience location business perfect missed alot city traffic easy accesss freeways clean spacious temperature control staff helpful friendly definately recommend hotel value

Reviews.Title: “Very Good Value, Very Good People”
Reviews.Author: Bananaman3m
Reviews.Content: hotel provided standards people exceptional stay pleasant airport pickup reason decided jameson access car evening happy choice restaurants returned pick called

Reviews.Title: “Spare yourself from a total nightmare”
Reviews.Author: Jen313
Reviews.Content: weve notified hamilton county health department hopefully thoroughly cleaned condemned cant imagine operate total lack management observed arrived 10 pm paid reservation key employee locked inside peeked thru security lock claimed door lock isnt outside door wasnt finished itd half hour manager key king bed 3 headed downstairs key dozen cars lot booked appologies concern exhausted 79 yo mother standing hall 2 queen beds ceiling lined mold distinct mold smell hot humid stuffy bathroom door literally falling apart wouldnt close towel rack sitting top toilet below holes wall wasnt exhaust fan bathroom mind builds bath exhaust fan exhausted 4th offer ac sleep despite extremely noisy arctic blast finally mildew smells 4 am alarm 10 min radio breakfast rotten apples orange bread solid starch offering raisin bran woman stocking breakfast bar slowly tho breakfast time empty raisin bran milk tea usually stay jameson kelly st fine simply wrong booking expedia close kelly st isnt glamourous address managment totally absent looks beautiful outsidebut dont risk health dozens hotels

Reviews.Title: “Great value, clean, friendly!”
Reviews.Author: lkinnyc
Reviews.Content: hotel clean nice staff friendly staying extended family family reunion staff accommodating including providing free shuttle service weekend events forth airport

Reviews.Title: “Great value”

Reviews.Content: amazing price hotwire pleased hotel 212 star rating dont understand clean staff friendly breakfast waffles gravy biscuits offerings short distance highway negative sound hall carry
